'''Anemo Slime-Swallowed Bamboo Shoots''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course: Part I}}. It is automatically added to the player's inventory after shooting the floating [[Anemo Slime]] tracked by [[Cloud Retainer]]'s machine. Cloud Retainer says that [[Ganyu]] prepared this ingredient.
